HeroSection.hero_desc: Forget manual quote templates – automate your quoting process easily and efficiently with a generator tailored directly to your needs.

AdditionalInfoSection.title: All Your Suppliers' Products in One Place!
AdditionalInfoSection.paragraph1: We have gathered a comprehensive selection of product data from multiple suppliers, so you don't have to browse their websites while creating quotes.
AdditionalInfoSection.paragraph2Middle: and check if the product information you are looking for is already available. If something is missing, don't hesitate to contact us – we're just a
AdditionalInfoSection.additionalTitle: If you're still creating your offers manually with Excel, you're missing out
AdditionalInfoSection.additionalSubtext: Focus on what matters – we streamline your quoting process so you can invest in

TestimonialsSection.from_daniels: Pion Blanc exceeded our expectations: The project was carried out with a solution-oriented and positive attitude, smoothly and with a strong focus on the client. We received personalized service and a functional end result.

DemoSection.title: How does this work?
DemoSection.section_1_paragraph: Find the right products quickly and effortlessly. With our tool, you can browse supplier product catalogs, use filters, and add products directly to a quotation – simple and efficient!
DemoSection.section_2_paragraph: Customize your quotation to perfection. You can easily save both your own and your customer's information for different offers. You can also set the quantities and discounts for the products added in the previous step. Finally, the completed offer can be downloaded using the 'Generate Offer' button.

Catalogue.main_text_bold: We've already collected data from these companies.
Catalogue.main_text_normal_start: Can't find what you're looking for?
Catalogue.main_text_normal_end: , and we'll check if we can source it for you. We'll provide all the details, including costs, so you can decide what works best for you.

OurStory.title: Pion Blanc - Who We Are
OurStory.paragraph1: Pion Blanc is a Finnish software company that focuses on providing user-friendly and efficient digital solutions for small businesses. We are approachable, young Master's degree graduates, and passionate developers who share a common background – we became friends early in our studies at Aalto University.
OurStory.paragraph2: Our company was founded when we identified a clear need for a tailored software solution to streamline the quoting process for small businesses – especially those still manually creating quotes using Excel.
OurStory.paragraph3: Currently, our service includes product data from around 20 bathroom interior suppliers, allowing businesses to access and use product information much more efficiently.
OurStory.paragraph4: However, we are much more than just the developers of an offer generator. Unlike large software companies whose products aim to serve the broadest possible customer base, we focus on tailored solutions designed specifically for your needs – and at a more affordable price. As a small and agile team, we can offer fast and flexible development without unnecessary overhead costs.
OurStory.paragraph5: Web technologies are our specialty, and we are happy to help our clients with new software projects and website solutions. If you have an idea or a need for a digital tool, we'd love to discuss it with you!
OurStory.QuoteJan: Good software feels effortless. That’s what we aim for.
OurStory.QuoteLauri: We turn complex problems into simple solutions.
OurStory.QuoteVille: Every business is unique – that’s why we create flexible solutions.

ContactUs.title: Contact us – we're here to help!
ContactUs.paragraph: Feel free to reach out, no strings attached! You can call or email us—we are easy to reach. It's important to us that you get a solution tailored to your needs, and we're happy to discuss how we can support your business.
ContactUs.exampleMessage1: I am ____ and my company is ______. Our quoting process needs more clarity, and I would like to see how your software works in practice. Would it be possible for you to give a short demo or explain how your current customers are using your solution?
ContactUs.exampleMessage2_1: I am _____, and my company is ________. We have the following issue, for which I believe a lightweight software solution could be the answer.
ContactUs.exampleMessage2_2: A brief description of the issue, e.g., 'Creating quotes takes a lot of time, and searching for product information from various sources leads to errors.'
ContactUs.exampleMessage2_3: I would like to hear if Pion Blanc could help us with this. How should we proceed?

Privacy.title: Privacy
Privacy.paragraph: We do not collect any personal data through this website. Our software handles data under individual agreements with our customers

ComparisonSection.title: Comparison
ComparisonSection.product_data_must_be_searched: Product data must be searched manually
ComparisonSection.expensive_not_for_sme: Expensive and rigid, not suitable for small businesses
